DOC.brief_summary: This trial is an assessment of the efficacy of three thromboprophylaxis regimens in two types of bariatric surgery. - gastric banding and gastric bypass on anti-Xa activity levels The study includes two groups of 150 patients scheduled for gastric banding or gastric bypass. Assessment of anti-Xa levels before and 4 hours after the injections from day 0 to 2 in order to determine the best prophylactic regimen allowing expected values ranged between 0.3 and 0.5 IU / ml.
DOC.criteria: BMI over 40 Gastric banding or gastric bypass Renal insufficiency Thrombopenia Long term anticoagulant treatment Pregnancy Allergy to heparin
DOC.keyword: prevention of venous thromboembolism in bariatric surgery
